reviewText: yet another copy of Hollywood film hidden face 2011. bhatt c/p
I give it 2 star because even though I love this movie and always will. The condition my item came in was horrible. I waited so long for it to reach me and what I got was not what I wanted .

Surprisingly good film
even without the main actor from the previous 2 films its well acted and has enough star power to carve a memorable story.
the 2nd half is very riveting
Great thriller in general

Personally this is the best "murder" in the film trilogy
Great acting the movie story is awesome and original but the ending is strange and leaves you literally wondering...HUh??? did that just happen
